sources.title: Rio Rita (1929)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. This musical comedy starring Bebe Daniels and John Boles was also the first film appearance of the comedy duo Wheeler & Woolsey. The finale of the film has an extended color sequence and the film ended up as a large box-office success. Unfortunately five reels of the film are believed to be lost, so the edited and cut version is all that remains.

metadata.Plot: Capt. James Stewart pursues the bandit "The Kinkajou" over the Mexican border and falls in love with Rita. He suspects, that her brother is the bandit.
metadata.Writer: Luther Reed, Guy Bolton, Fred Thompson
metadata.Actors: Bebe Daniels, John Boles, Bert Wheeler
